gif.alt: A video showing how to assign a value to a variable in Scratch

scratch-assign-var-step-1.step_text: From the data menu, drag the set variable block to your canvas.
scratch-assign-var-step-1.alt: Shows the procedure for dragging the set variable block to canvas

scratch-assign-var-step-2.step_text: In the small window, type the number or text you want to assign to your variable.
scratch-assign-var-step-2.alt: Shows the location of the variable set window

scratch-assign-var-step-3.step_text: To use a variable, drag the oval with the variable name into a slot.
scratch-assign-var-step-3.alt: ow to drag a variable to use it in your Scratch program
